subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Television
lead_paragraph: Working as a sideline or in-stadium reporter is usually not an easy job. But it has been taken to absurd lows by Pam Shriver at the U.S. Open.
snippet: Working as a sideline or in-stadium reporter is usually not an easy job. But it has been taken to absurd lows by Pam Shriver at the U.S. Open.
